name: Louis Vuitton x NBA Basketball Keepall 55 Travel Bag
description: The Louis Vuitton x NBA collaboration brings this iconic Keepall 55 travel bag. Crafted with monogram canvas and featuring the NBA logo, it's designed for basketball fans and fashion enthusiasts alike.

name: Louis Vuitton x NBA Monogram Black Windbreaker Parka Jacket
description: A stylish windbreaker parka jacket from Louis Vuitton x NBA, featuring a monogram black pattern. The jacket combines comfort and high fashion, perfect for cold weather and sports enthusiasts.

name: Louis Vuitton Timberland 6" Ankle Boot in Black Monogram Nubuck Calf Leather
description: These Timberland ankle boots by Louis Vuitton are crafted from black monogram nubuck calf leather. They combine rugged durability with luxury, making them a unique fashion statement.

name: Burberry Check Folding Umbrella
description: A Burberry classic: the Check folding umbrella. Known for its iconic check pattern and high-quality craftsmanship, it's a stylish and functional accessory for any rainy day.

name: Louis Vuitton Nano Noé Handbag
description: The Louis Vuitton Nano Noé is a miniature version of the iconic Noé handbag, crafted with monogram canvas. A perfect blend of luxury and practicality for carrying your essentials.

name: Louis Vuitton Damier Infini Campus Backpack in White Leather
description: The Louis Vuitton Damier Infini Campus backpack is crafted from white leather, offering a sleek and luxurious look. This versatile bag is perfect for both everyday use and travel.

name: Louis Vuitton Home Mirror Trunk
description: An elegant Louis Vuitton Home Mirror Trunk that combines the brand's craftsmanship with luxurious design. Perfect as a decorative centerpiece or collectible statement piece.

name: Adidas Originals 3D Trefoil 3-Stripes Track Jacket
description: A stylish Adidas Originals track jacket featuring the 3D Trefoil logo and classic 3-Stripes design. Lightweight and comfortable, perfect for casual wear or workouts.

name: Louis Vuitton Ombre Nomade Eau de Parfum
description: The Louis Vuitton Ombre Nomade Eau de Parfum is a luxurious fragrance with rich, woody, and smoky tones. A deep and mysterious scent that captures the essence of exploration.

name: Gucci Script Nylon Jacket
description: The Gucci Script Nylon Jacket offers a blend of sporty comfort and high-end style, featuring the iconic Gucci logo. Perfect for layering during transitional seasons.

name: Louis Vuitton Shorts
description: These Louis Vuitton shorts feature a minimal yet luxurious design with premium materials, perfect for casual summer wear with a touch of elegance.

name: 'Let Us Run' Sneaker Design Commission for Six Hundred Four Shoes
description: A unique art-meets-fashion collaboration sneaker commissioned by Six Hundred Four Shoes, titled 'Let Us Run'. Designed for collectors who value creativity and craftsmanship.

name: Louis Vuitton Monogram Shine Shawl
description: The Louis Vuitton Monogram Shine Shawl combines softness with subtle shine, made from a blend of silk and wool. A timeless accessory for every luxury wardrobe.

name: Robosen Elite Optimus Prime Auto-Converting Robot
description: An advanced Robosen Elite Optimus Prime robot that auto-converts between modes with voice commands. A collector's dream for fans of Transformers and tech enthusiasts.

name: Squid Game 'Young-hee' Doll
description: A collectible Squid Game 'Young-hee' doll inspired by the hit series. A striking display piece for fans and pop culture collectors.

name: Louis Vuitton Millionaires Joystorm Sunglasses
description: Louis Vuitton Millionaires Joystorm sunglasses with bold design and signature detailing. A luxury eyewear statement that blends modern edge with classic LV craftsmanship.

name: Free Breast Implant Surgery
description: A full breast implant surgery, performed by a licensed and professional surgeon. A premium, life-changing experience for those looking to enhance their body.

name: Louis Vuitton Multicolor Monogram Skateboard Deck
description: A collectible Louis Vuitton skateboard deck featuring the multicolor monogram pattern. A bold fusion of luxury fashion and skate culture.

name: Louis Vuitton x NBA Basketball
description: A premium Louis Vuitton x NBA basketball crafted with iconic monogram details. A luxury collector's item for fashion and sports enthusiasts.

name: Louis Vuitton Doudou Re-Addiction Teddy Bear
description: An adorable and highly collectible Louis Vuitton Doudou Re-Addiction Teddy Bear crafted with premium materials and signature detailing.

name: Chanel Blue Quilted Lambskin Mini Rectangular Flap
description: A luxurious Chanel Mini Rectangular Flap bag crafted from blue quilted lambskin. A timeless fashion statement and collector's favorite.

name: Loona V24 Smart Robot Pet Dog
description: Loona V24 is an advanced smart robot pet dog powered by AI, featuring gesture recognition, voice commands, and real-time interaction for kids and adults.

name: PlayStation 5 Slim Ghost of Yotei Gold Limited Edition Bundle
description: A rare PlayStation 5 Slim Ghost of Yotei Gold Limited Edition bundle, crafted with premium gold detailing. A must-have for gaming collectors.

name: Louis Vuitton Monogram Wool Carry On Cap
description: A Louis Vuitton Monogram Wool Carry On Cap featuring luxury craftsmanship and signature monogram styling. A perfect fashion accessory for any season.

name: Samsung 7.5 cu. ft. Smart Gas Dryer with Steam Sanitize+
description: A premium Samsung smart gas dryer featuring Steam Sanitize+ technology, Wi-Fi connectivity, and sensor drying. Offers 10 preset drying cycles and optimal fabric care with 7.5 cubic feet capacity.

name: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max (512GB)
description: The latest Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max with 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR display, A18 Pro chip, 48MP triple camera system with 5x optical zoom, and all-day battery life. Features Titanium design, Action button, and advanced computational photography.

name: Apple MacBook Air 13-inch M4 Chip (16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) - Sky Blue
description: Apple MacBook Air 13-inch with the revolutionary M4 chip, featuring 10-core CPU and 10-core GPU. 16GB unified memory with 512GB SSD storage. Lightweight design in stunning Sky Blue with Liquid Retina display, up to 18 hours of battery life, and advanced AI capabilities.
